scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,green "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n server,client,web -c blue,green,magenta "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client && npm run build:web
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../web && npm install
scripts.pack:all: npm run pack:mac && npm run pack:win
